comment.author: 35317829@N06
comment._content: Incredible detail! And just as remarkable was the rediscovery of the wreck not so long ago by the Maritime Heritage Office. There is a chapter dedicated to the construction of this ship  in Ian Johnston's book Clydebank Battlecruisers which show the birth of this great battlecruiser.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/35317829@N06] It is amazing isn't it?! For anyone who is interested, there is a detailed shipwreck report available here.
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
